meta.title: Our Team | Aero Prosthetics
meta.description: Meet the dedicated professionals at Aero Prosthetics committed to providing exceptional prosthetic and orthotic care.

hero.title: Our Team
hero.subtitle: Dedicated professionals committed to your mobility and quality of life

leadership.title: Leadership Team
leadership.description: Our leadership team brings decades of combined experience in prosthetics, orthotics, and patient care.

clinicians.title: Clinical Team
clinicians.description: Our certified prosthetists and orthotists are experts in their field with advanced training and education.

technicians.title: Technical Team
technicians.description: Our skilled technicians craft custom prosthetic and orthotic devices with precision and attention to detail.

support.title: Support Team
support.description: Our administrative and patient care coordinators ensure a seamless experience throughout your journey.

values.title: Our Team Values
values.description: Every member of our team is guided by these core principles:

items.title: Patient-Centered Care
items.description: We put patients first in everything we do, focusing on individual needs and goals.

items.title: Clinical Excellence
items.description: We maintain the highest standards of clinical practice and continuous education.

items.title: Compassion
items.description: We approach each patient with empathy, understanding, and respect.

items.title: Innovation
items.description: We embrace new technologies and approaches to improve patient outcomes.

careers.title: Join Our Team
careers.description: We're always looking for talented professionals to join our team. Visit our careers page to learn more about current opportunities.
